title: The Cold Frontier: A journey on China's North Korea border
text:
The Cold Frontier: A journey on China's North Korea border 7:17pm IST - 02:11 
China's border with North Korea is one of the few ways for outsiders to see life in the world's most isolated country. As Reuters reporter Sue-lin Wong and photographer Damir Sagolj discovered in a weeklong trip along the Chinese side, it also reveals how the two sides connect.
